website_summaries.verdict: Looks to reverse the causes of cellulite and revert it into healthy, flat tissue.
pros: Contains caffeine and a plant molecule called glaucine, both of which are anti-inflammatory
It’s a thick cream that doesn't feel sticky when you rub it on and smell is pretty good
Lots of users reported an improvement in tightness and dimples
Skin feels very soft after using
cons: There are issues with the pump, which dispenses very little product and is prone to breaking

customer_reviews.title: Works good and the smell is ok
customer_reviews.text: I really like the cream. It works well for cellulite, especially if you massage it into your skin. The smell is ok. It's tolerable and it goes away. I've tried other cellulite creams where I can't stand the smell and it lingers on all day. The smell on this one seems to fade away within 30 minutes. My only wish is that it came in a larger container. Still giving it 5 stars because it works for me. Cellulite has faded from my thighs and my skin looks smoother.
customer_reviews.author: T-Sk8

customer_reviews.title: Great company, great profuct
customer_reviews.text: The smell is nice! And the only way it might cause heart issues if you are super sensitive to caffeine, because it does contain caffeine to help fight cellulite! Awesome company!!!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Vizcarra

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: In the process of losing weight so that may be contributing as well but my skin does feel a lot firmer. It smells like grape lol
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this cream and really like how fast it improves the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Clarion Reyes-Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Super fast absortion!!! Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It absorbs super fast, not sticky at all and smells super neutral (ideal for those of us who dont like strong smelling products).
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Pardo

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Very moisturizing. Just started using so I haven't seen any results yet.
customer_reviews.author: alison

customer_reviews.title: Make the bottle bigger!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this for about a week and i really see a difference! I have bad cellulite on my legs and now i see that it’s kinda fading away the dimples aren’t as deep!! Would’ve gave 5 star but the bottle is too little I’m already running ... especially if you’re putting it on twice a day & more than one area buy more than one bottle
customer_reviews.author: Meliza96

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: It is very clear that this stuff works. I have been using it for almost a week and a half and I can see changes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Making a difference
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product and noticed a small difference in the appearance of Cellulite on the back of my legs in little over a week. I have been working out the past 3 months and although my legs are getting more muscular the cellulite is hanging on for dear life. With the help of this cream I can wear shorts now and not be self conscious about my legs. The smell is more like a medicinal smell so that doesn't bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Krueger

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars because I’m still using it
customer_reviews.text: This is my 1st time using it so I’m not sure if it’s effective yet... ive only been using it for a month..So I can’t really leave a valid opinion... I apply it on what I feel is my trouble areas... love handles, hamstrings & triceps. The bottle is pretty small & probably the most negative thing I can say... I will continue to use it and update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy C. Cordero

customer_reviews.title: Works Great  skin looks younger and softer
customer_reviews.text: Really helped. Need to use every night and use as directed but it really works well. I exercised a little as well. My skin looked years younger and even took on a youthful glow.
customer_reviews.author: Kw

customer_reviews.title: Smells great absorbs easily into skin.
customer_reviews.text: I very much enjoy this product. It smells like coffee and bubble gum. So I don't mind that. It is a little bit small for the price that you pay but I'm hoping that it works in a couple weeks I will come back with a review on how it worked for me personally. But all in all it's a pretty good product I only gave value-for-money three stars because of how small the actual bottle it is. I've heard great things about it so I'm hoping that it works for me as well
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Does not absorb well
customer_reviews.text: I'm 65. I have been trying this for 2weeks now. I see no difference yet and probably won't. What I do see is that it does not absorb easily and feels more like it's pulling my skin. I have to use it with body lotion. And several times it's flaked back off because it never absorbed. Won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie W

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should try this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and well all the products of this brand ive tried so far! This cellulite cream makes your skin feel so Smooth and soft. Its the first thing i do in the morning and the smell is also a fav of mine💖
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Simon

customer_reviews.title: Works fast!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. Let me start by saying how quickly it absorbs into the skin. I don’t like lotions or creams that take forever to rub in, but this is fast! The scent is okay. It doesn’t linger too long, so that’s a plus. I noticed my skin feeling more form after about 14 days. This is a must have product especially during summer time. I’m anxious to see how great my thighs look after the entire bottle is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor M

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It goes on very smooth and leaves my skin soft. It's not greasy like other products that I have tried. I love that it's not sticky or slimy at all. Definitely worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Eryn Hull

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bottle/Amount seemed a little low for the price. But if I continue to see results, I feel that it is worth it It smells GREAT! I have already seen results after a couple of days. I don't think it would be a good product if the cellulite were severe. Mine is minimal so I am seeing better results.
customer_reviews.author: Kaytlynn Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Cellulite Cream for Women
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this cream now for about 2 weeks and can tell my skin looks smoother. Goes on easy, absorbs well and doesn't leave a sticky feeling. Smell is okay - doesn't linger. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Renea Z.

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel, nice scent and great price! Good results :)
customer_reviews.text: This cream is rich and ultra moisturizing with no greasy feel! My skin feels soft and supple and also felt firmer after the first use! I gained about 45 lbs during my pregnancy and with it, came cellulite on my thighs, butt, and abdomen. I’ve tried other creams and oils which provided no results, had a weird smell, and were expensive. This cream has a pleasant light scent and is budget friendly! I do wish the bottles were bigger or had options for bigger bottles just to limit the clutter of buying 2 or 3. All in all it’s great and I’m happy with my results thus far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaves skin soft and moisturized
customer_reviews.text: It goes on nice and easy. Does not leave a greasy feel to it. The scent is not bad, but also my favorite but I'm used to bath and body works scents. Bottle is larger than I thought and actually lasts quite some time. Though I've not used long enough to notice serious results
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Starting to see results!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using the anti-cellulite cream for a week now and can definitely see a difference! After having my baby a few months ago, I noticed I had cellulite on my inner thighs. I’ve already started to see the positive results of this product on my right leg. I’m excited to see even stronger results in the future as I continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley N

customer_reviews.title: Tightens and firms
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the cream for a few days now and really like it. At first I thought the scent was a little overwhelming, but I’ve grown to like it . It almost smells like mint-chocolate. Strange for a lotion but it grows on you. It seems to be working pretty well. It tightens and firms the skin. I will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Awful smell
customer_reviews.text: I use this product on my thighs only as the smell is not very nice, so I won't use it on my arms. It is a thicker lotion also, which is okay, but not what I thought it would be. Have not noticed a difference in my cellulite. :(
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Works greats!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a week now, and I can definitely start to see a difference! I had cellulite on my thighs, and after one week I'm starting to notice them clearing up. Not a big difference but definitely noticable! I also love how smooth the lotion goes on too!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Farinelli

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to smooth legs
customer_reviews.text: Love this natural cream. The texture is nice and it absorbs well. Smells good. Just started to use so will know how well it helps my orange peel legs but I know absorability and moisture are important.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lin

customer_reviews.title: Gave me heart issues!
customer_reviews.text: This product gave me horrible heart palpitations! I never would have thought it would have done that but sure enough when I stopped using it the palpitations stopped. Awful product! Not safe!
customer_reviews.author: Danie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I've been applying it twice a day and it's been helping my cellulite! I definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: ob

customer_reviews.title: Small bottle
customer_reviews.text: Did nothing, too thick to apply, and way overpriced for a small bottle
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Omg it actually worked!
customer_reviews.text: Affordable, easy to massage, unlike many creams that slather on and need a lot of massaging to be absorbed. Subtle scent that goes away and won’t linger. And to top it all, it works! I’ve been using it for a month and there is a definite visible difference. I am pleasantly surprised and will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Arpita

customer_reviews.title: I can already tell a difference
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars on the cellulite cream. I've been using it just under a week and can already tell a big difference. Remember, it is not an overnight cure, so stay faithful and follow the directions and do it twice a day for best results.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Broussard

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Smell & Broken Part
customer_reviews.text: Top twisty part didn’t function and I don’t like the smell of the lotion, strong bad smell. Also note that the bottle is tiny. I haven’t used it long enough to say if the product works for cellulite - will give an update later.
customer_reviews.author: Blue state re(a)d

customer_reviews.title: Not greasy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. Very reasonable price. I like that it is in a easy pump bottle, enjoy the smell and my favorite thing about it is that it doesn't leave me skin feeling greasy, it goes on smooth and soak in quickly leaving my skin soft.
customer_reviews.author: The Working Man

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well have been using for 2 weeks and am already seeing a difference. The price is also very good other products like this are more expensive
customer_reviews.author: L erazmus

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: I am not using this product for long to see results yet, but I love creamy texture which does not leave skin oily or sticky.Super absorbent. The scent a little bit too strong after applying cream but wears off after while.Good design, with pump it goes much easier. Definitely will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Mariya Arnutovskaya

customer_reviews.title: Small bottle, but great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the cream for two weeks now and have already noticed my skin looking tighter and smoother. Will be ordering again soon!

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG. This is the best cream... it really worked on my arms cellulite. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Crisostomo

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for a few weeks now. It’s ok. Helps with the moisture but doesn’t smell the best. Haven’t seen any changes other wise.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Very moisturizing. Just starting to see results at the end of the first bottle. ~2 weeks using twice a day. I wish the bottle was larger. I did not mind the smell at all even though others mentioned it. It kind of reminded me of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: You can see the difference in less than 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical at first but decided to give it a try. I’ve been using Mommy Knows Best Anti Cellulite Cream twice a day for less than 2 weeks and I can already see the difference. It smells nice and just a small amount is enough. I will be ordering again!
customer_reviews.author: E.P.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for 3 weeks and I have notice the difference. It has a litter buttery feeling which I don't love I prefer gel so that it wont stick to my pants but the product does works
customer_reviews.author: Adri

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this product! Been using for awhile and see results!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth George

customer_reviews.title: Feels good on my skin
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel of the product on my skin. I have just started using it so cannot comment yet as to whether it works.
customer_reviews.author: AKC79

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked how this product applied to my skin. I followed the instructions and used one pump per leg twice a day. I had visibly firmer results in a month! I will keep using it on other areas since it smoothed my skin on my legs wonderfully.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This cream do absolutely nothing ! Just waste of time and money
customer_reviews.author: Valeriia, Denys

customer_reviews.title: smell is horrid
customer_reviews.text: "Parfum (fragrance)" is listed in the ingredients so I'm assuming this product should smell somewhat pleasant. Used for the first time today and honestly would rather reek of cellulite than this cream. Maybe it is way old, there is no date only a lot#. Can you please tell me the date for LOT.G02N6?
customer_reviews.author: hackerOUT

customer_reviews.title: Good, works, good price
customer_reviews.text: I like this cream alot. You dont need alot because a little bit goes very far. I feel like it is working too but only time will tell. I think it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for your skin!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing for my skin, helped a lot with cellulite. The only thing I would change is the packaging because it is hard to get the last amount of the cream inside.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. This literally does nothing for cellulite. I religiously used this product by instructions and there is no difference from day one. However, my skin is nicely moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: After having my second child, the skin on my bottom and back of my thighs was not as smooth as it once was. I have noticed a difference in smoothness after only a couple weeks of use!!
customer_reviews.author: Karissa

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Was okay but takes a while to see any results and it smelled awful.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Follow the directions
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this cream. Only thing is to make sure you use it daily & a little workout to help tone the problem area. Other than that it really does help reduce the cellulite!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Pelletier

customer_reviews.title: It does work.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first product I have used that actually decreased the appearance of the cellulite on my thighs. I will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Great lotion!!
customer_reviews.text: This lotion is really great! It has a nice smell, absorbs well and really seems to be working. I have been using it for a few weeks and see a difference!

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: The results were not exactly as promised but I have noticed some improvement compared to before.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Van Huis

customer_reviews.title: Staying committed to the product there will be results.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for my cellulite and bloating. I noticed a difference in my bloating after 3 weeks. For my cellulite I’ve noticed a minimal change.
customer_reviews.author: gabriel e guzman

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far!!
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this product for 3 days now but I’ve been using it twice a day and I love it so far!! It’s not super thick, and it has a nice smell!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken pump
customer_reviews.text: Seems okay so far. But my pump never worked so it has been pretty annoying to have to take the lid off to get any lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Cait

customer_reviews.title: Non greasy
customer_reviews.text: This cream is not greasy at all, it absorbs really fast Which I love because you can wear it all day. Also it has somewhat of a fruity kind of smell.
customer_reviews.author: Clarivel Irizarry

customer_reviews.title: Nice lotion
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this makes my skin feel!! I don’t love the smell, but it goes away quickly and leaves skin nice and soft!

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product and I missed return date by a day. The smell is HORRIBLE and the bottle size is VERY tiny ... waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy A.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Honestly it’s horrible it’s thick like glue and I haven’t seen any results. It’s been almost a month. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Firmness
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working ok, haven’t really seen much. Haven’t been ya g it that long. But I do see some firmness in my skin
customer_reviews.author: Shonny Denise

customer_reviews.title: Work's Wonders
customer_reviews.text: I've used other, more expensive creams over the years. And this one works just as great for a fraction of the price!

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it

customer_reviews.title: Little goes a long way so use sparingly.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Noticed results right away! Visibly Reduces cellulite on the first use :)

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for a couple weeks and my skin is looking and feeling so much better in the areas needed. Love it!!

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product , after 2 weeks using this cream my cellulite is less. I very impressed with the results in short time.

customer_reviews.title: No noticeable difference
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for a month. Have not seen any difference at all.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for thigh cellulite
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy this product! Pleasant smell and noticing improvements on my thighs after a week of use.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: It only worked on buttocks and stomach. Did nothing for thighs or sides.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: The cream is amazing I’ve been using it for a week and I can Se the difference already!

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying this product so far and seeing some results! Can’t wait to continue use

customer_reviews.title: Great product must try
customer_reviews.text: Product is really good. Just started using but so far results are coming together

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product! It smells really nice and goes on smoothly.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Has a chocolate/caramel scent. Start seeing results within couple uses.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! Feel confident it will work, as indicated.
customer_reviews.author: sdcasper

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff! Already ordered another
customer_reviews.text: I've noticed results not long after my first application, my belly hips and butt highly recommend the item and seller Update I've only used It once on butt, thighs and stomach and I noticed results almost as soon as I got it massaged in. I've already ordered another. My only problem is it came with a way to try another product by them but my phone won't let me screenshot the order info they need. Hopefully the seller will contact me about this
customer_reviews.author: Kayla W

customer_reviews.title: Really smooths the appearance of cellulite!
customer_reviews.text: This was the first cellulite cream I have tried and I am hooked! I have been using it 1-2 times a day for 2 months now and it really helps smooth the appearance of cellulite on my legs and butt. The other plus is the scent is light and pleasant. I will definitely continue to purchase as it is an important part of my daily routine!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica McCall

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is super smooth and super hydrating! I think it's lessoned some of my cellulite, but if not I know it's working on it! It's got a very light smell and is just all around super moisturizing! I use it all over as just a general lotion now because of how moisturizing it is!
customer_reviews.author: My079585

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing. Time will tell effectiveness.
customer_reviews.text: I’ll have to come back after a few weeks of use to update my thoughts but for now I wasn’t particularly as fan of the smell but it didn’t linger long and as soon as it went on it felt very moisturizing. My skin seemed tighter but also soft to the touch. I’m happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: STEPHENRH

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Smells like coffee. Not sure it works as well as reviews stated but everyone is different.
customer_reviews.author: Nita Louise

customer_reviews.title: Good moisturizer,  but nothing more.
customer_reviews.text: The product is very rich, which is great for moisturizing. But in terms of efficacy in diminishing the appearance of those pesky dimples, no noticeable difference after using the entire bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Carol G

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad
customer_reviews.text: The smell is VERY strong and unpleasant. Haven’t noticed any difference after using a month. Wouldn’t recommend.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I've seen improvements with 2 weeks, it definitely does something, I'm about to order another one.

customer_reviews.title: Pump doesn’t work.had my son try, he’s in engineering, right mom, this doesn’t work! Send it back
customer_reviews.text: Bought it & the pump doesn’t work.got a second , same thing -what’s wrong with their packaging? All my other creams I buy work perfectly .i think mommy needs some help !

customer_reviews.text: This is great for a moisturizer but it does nothing for cellulite very disappointing

product_meta.title: Mommy Knows Best Anti Cellulite Cream - Skin Tightening Cream for Body and Stomach - 4 fl oz
feature_bullets: Proprietary blend of ingredients clinically proven to reduce the appearance of cellulite
Penetrates the skin effectively and helps decrease the fat deposits and reduce water retention
Promotes "Reverse Differentiation" which causes fat cells and fat tissue to reverse its form into healthy, fibrolast-like tissue
Key ingredients include Glaucine, Bupleurum Falcatum, Coenzyme-A, Caffeine, and L-Carnitine
No parabens, hypoallergenic, non-comedogenic and not animal tested

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
